description: Try our easy to follow Cherry Roll Ups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Cherry,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cherry Roll Ups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 70oC and line a baking tray with non-stick baking paper.
Place cherries, honey and lemon juice in a blender and blend until smooth.
Place cherry mixture in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook for 15 minutes or until reduced to a jam-like consistency.
Using the back of a spatula, spread mixture evenly over the tray, into a 3mm-thick rectangle.
Bake for 3 hours or until fruit leather is no longer tacky to the touch.

Set aside to cool completely. Using kitchen scissors, cut fruit leather and baking paper lengthways into 4cm-wide strips. Roll up the fruit leather strips with the baking paper still attached and serve.
